Item.Name: Bootstrap-Request Trigger
Item.Description: When this Resource is executed the LwM2M Client MUST initiate a "Client Initiated Bootstrap" procedure in using the LwM2M Bootstrap-Server Account.

Item.Name: Last Bootstrapped
Item.Description: If this resource is defined, it represents the last time that the bootstrap server updated this LwM2M Server Account. The LwM2M Client is responsible for updating this value. When the Bootstrap Server detects that this LwM2M Server Account is "out-of-date", the Bootstrap Server can update the LwM2M Server Account as represented by the LwM2M Server object instance.
